result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) and Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) was dismissed by the court.

  • Stephen Donald Sporle was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant shall pay fine of $1,400.00 in this matter.

superMiscConds.notes:
Defendant shall not possess or consume any alcoholic beverages or nonprescription controlled substance, or any prescription medicine for which the defendant does not have a current prescription for.

Defendant shall not enter into any establishment where the primary purpose is the sale of alcoholic beverage.

Defendant shall abide by all other terms and conditions deemed appropriate by Department of Corrections.

supervisions.notes: Defendant shall undergo an AODA assessment and follow through with all recommendations thereof.
